name: hologqlcontainer
description: A Holochain Container with GraphQL features

scripts.hc-package: cd hApp/hApp1/ && hc package -o dist/bundle.json && cd ../..
scripts.hc-test: cd hApp/hApp1/ && hc test | tap-spec && cd ../..
